# cmccloudv2_iam_user_server_permission (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# set permission `view` only for user `3hr4enp52tvg_dev` on server `464a2fd1-eccb-4568-b20d-993f15355a2a`
resource "cmccloudv2_iam_user_server_permission" "server_read" {
	user_name    = "3hr4enp52tvg_dev"
	server_id    = "464a2fd1-eccb-4568-b20d-993f15355a2a"
	blocked      = false
	allow_view   = true
	allow_edit   = false
	allow_create = false
	allow_delete = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `server_id` (String) The ID of the server
- `user_name` (String) The username of the user

### Optional

- `allow_create` (Boolean) Whether the user is allowed to create resources on the server
- `allow_delete` (Boolean) Whether the user is allowed to delete resources on the server
- `allow_edit` (Boolean) Whether the user is allowed to edit the server
- `allow_view` (Boolean) Whether the user is allowed to view the server
- `blocked` (Boolean) Whether the user is blocked from the server
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
